name: infobip-sms-mcp-server
title: Infobip SMS MCP server
summary: The Infobip SMS MCP server enables agentic and developer workflows to send and manage SMS messages through Infobip's platform.
description: The Infobip SMS MCP server enables agentic and developer workflows to send and manage SMS messages through Infobip's platform.

useCases.name: Send SMS messages
useCases.description: Send text and templated SMS messages to end users, including PINs and transactional notifications.

useCases.name: Sender management
useCases.description: List and manage available SMS senders and short codes associated with an account.

useCases.name: Campaigns & bulk messaging
useCases.description: Prepare and launch marketing or notification campaigns to contact lists using templates and scheduled delivery.

useCases.name: Delivery reporting
useCases.description: Query delivery and reporting information for sent messages to track status and errors.

infobipSMSOAuth.description: OAuth 2.1 PKCE supported for delegated auth. See the managed OAuth link provided by Infobip for client and endpoint details.
